author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking to develop a Toolkit for community groups that organize events (from as small as a one-day festival to as large as a regional airshow) to help them assess the economic and community impact of their activities such as, money spent, volunteer hours, etc.  
Please forward any documents, materials and/or information related to community group event assessment tools or resources.  Your time and expertise are appreciated.
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Community Group's Assessment Toolkit
